bug.author: holdenk
bug.summary: Kubeflow (from 5ecfa5b2e48a89c6e0d6835cc93a47c04262af28 ) does not generate user namespace w/minikube
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: I deployed Kubeflow locally to minikube, but when I log into the UI there is no namespace and I can't launch any notebooks (also no expirements can be loaded). I deployed Kubeflow as follows kfctl init preview07 && cd preview07 && kfctl generate all -V && kfctl apply all -V I then waited for it to stabilize: kubectl get pods --all-namespaces -w After everything* seem stable I connected to the Kubeflow web UI by running: minikube service istio-ingressgateway --namespace istio-system This opened many tabs, including http://192.168.39.159:31380/ which had the KF UI. However it says no namespace. *Except the ml-pipeline-persistenceagent-69f558486c-lnsj7 What did you expect to happen: On accessing the Kubeflow UI I expected to have a user profile as described in <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/other-guides/multi-user-overview/#step-2-creating-a-user-profile>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/other-guides/multi-user-overview/#step-2-creating-a-user-profile</denchmark-link>
Anything else you would like to add: [Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.] Minikube appeared to be running ok:
minikube status host: Running kubelet: Running apiserver: Running kubectl: Correctly Configured: pointing to minikube-vm at 192.168.39.159
Was running:
minikube version minikube version: v1.3.1 commit: ca60a424ce69a4d79f502650199ca2b52f29e631
Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): kfctl 5ecfa5b
kfctl version: (use kfctl version):
Kubernetes platform:minikube
Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version):
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"15", GitVersion:"v1.15.3", GitCommit:"2d3c76f9091b6bec110a5e63777c332469e0cba2", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-08-19T11:13:54Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.9", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"} Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"15", GitVersion:"v1.15.2", GitCommit:"f6278300bebbb750328ac16ee6dd3aa7d3549568", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-08-05T09:15:22Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): NAME="Ubuntu" VERSION="18.04.3 LTS (Bionic Beaver)" ID=ubuntu ID_LIKE=debian PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS" VERSION_ID="18.04" HOME_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/" SUPPORT_URL="https://help.ubuntu.com/" BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/" PRIVACY_POLICY_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/legal/terms-and-policies/privacy-policy" VERSION_CODENAME=bionic UBUNTU_CODENAME=bionic
